sense.gloss: to step forward, to step forth, to advance
to start, to embark on, to set forth on, to take steps toward

sdata.j: ↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓への↑一↑↓いっ↓↑歩↑↓ぽ↓を↑踏↑↓|ふ↓み↑出↑↓だ↓す|べく↑体験↑↓たいけん↓↑入学↑↓にゅうがく↓に↑行↑↓い↓ってみた。
sdata.e: I took the first step towards my dream by visiting the school to see if it was right for me.

sdata.j: ↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓への↑一↑↓いっ↓↑歩↑↓ぽ↓を↑踏↑↓|ふ↓み↑出↑↓だ↓す|べく↑体験↑↓たいけん↓↑入学↑↓にゅうがく↓に↑行↑↓い↓ってみた。
sdata.e: I went to see the school so as to take the first step towards my dream.
